Name: Ututu

Skin.Texture: Puffy, Soft, and Cushiony, Like a Cloud or Pillow.

Summary: Ututu dances around marshes in the early morning. If she sees a lost person, she tries to guide them home with wind and flashes of light. She often gets into arguments.

Powers.Description: Can emit flames from their body.
Can see infared colors, which lets them see hot items.
